item.title: door-api
item.description: door-api is a rest server to provide Deep Packet Inspection obtained by DOOR. DooR is Deep packet inspectOr On Router.

item.title: Mixlunch
item.description: Mixlunch is a lunch platform which helps people connect with each other. https://www.mixlunch.com/ Description slides are here.

item.title: yarana-bot
item.description: yarana-bot is bot application in LINE to help you to do regularly Features Register what you want to do regularly Record it when you do Show you the records Push message at 10:00PM(JST) if you didn’t record your activity. Application link is here. GitHub links https://github.com/momotaro98/yarana-bot https://github.com/momotaro98/yarana-api

item.title: Alert-On-Viber
item.description: Alert-On-Viber is notification system for production alert. It is running on Azure Functions and using APIs of Viber chat application. Presentation about this creation

item.title: Page Contents Sidebar
item.description: Page Contents Sidebar is Google Chrome extension for Markdown on Gist Features Display header title of Markdown file Jump to target area Change the depth of the display header Track and focus on current browsing points Change the sidebar width The sidebar can be hidden with a single button Application link is here.

item.title: qiic
item.description: qiic is an unofficial CLI Tool of Qiita service. Features get your 20 Stocked Qiita articles show the articles with readable table open the articles in your browser with an allocated number Application link is here.

item.title: Decision Tree for HEMS Recommendations
item.description: Decision Tree for HEMS Recommendations is library for human behavior recommendation of Home Energy Management System(HEMS) using Decition Tree learning. This is for my master degree research.

item.title: auto-curtain
item.description: I implemented automatically working curtain in my room. It can be also operated by your device.

item.title: momotaro-task-app
item.description: momotaro-task-app is a feature-rich task management tool Features Setting task execution timefile WEB timerfile Send execution result mailfile Executed task visualizationfile Target setting for task addifile Application link is here.
